strapiPost.title: Northwest Arkansas Ranks Among World's Best Places to Bike
strapiPost.content:
PeopleForBikes has released its 2022 Best Places to Bike list, with Northwest Arkansas's big-four cities ranking among the world's best places for cycling.

  • Southern bike bells: Bentonville, Rogers, Springdale, and Fayetteville earned above-average ratings for their access to bike networks, as well as rankings in the top five bikeable cities for the US South region. 
  • Intentionality: Criteria for making the Best Places to Bike List include offering practical strategies to improve biking, such as youth engagement, network connectivity, and trail development.

Explore the list and view interactive maps of your city's bike networks HERE.
